task.summary:
Major changes - working to finalize things.
What to do next: - continue / finish all test files. - optimize cloning
Updating line.ts parseBy... becomes from... new Line().fromPoints(), ....
new Vector().fromString() = new Vector(string) Bug correction on point.ts
Circle.tangents is now working for an external point
